name: A Happy Home
description:
WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

SPACE to Interact

(Flashing lights may affect persons with photosensitive epilepsy)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Home for a lot of people is a place of comfort, for us it's a chore to get anything done. An AI run smart-home makes for a bad parent, attempt to disable all of its functions and appliances, while doing chores, by solving puzzles to escape before it catches on.

I bet you can't beat New Game Plus!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programming:

Brandon Driesse

Joe Varca

Mason Matutina

 

Art:

Mike Relleva

 

Sound Design:

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the Global Game Jam 2019 at SCAD Savannah:
